title: Delhi
creator_credit: Films Division, Government of India and Ezra Mir
brief_description: Delhi, yesterday and today. Seven times capital of India, it combines the architectural splendour of Mogul and earlier times with a modern garden city. The hotels; the new diplomatic enclave; the mosques and palaces of Shah Jehan; a pre-Mogul fort; holidaying in Delhi today.
